attributes.action: prevent any further raids on the lottery funds to pay for the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current leaks within the media suggest that more lottery funds will be snatched from worthy causes throughout the rest of Britain to fund the London olympics. 

Unless there are cast-iron guarantees that all the areas losing funding will benefit from the olympics, then these raids should be barred.
